thread.title: The Trump-Kim Summit, Lost in Translation

author: Gerald F. Seib
title: The Trump-Kim Summit, Lost in Translation
text:
A while back, there was a hit movie entitled “Lost in Translation.” It was set in Japan.
It probably should have been set on the Korean Peninsula.
That became clear Thursday when President Donald Trumpabruptly canceled the highly anticipated summit meeting he had agreed to hold with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un. It’s unclear whether this...
